title: Faith811
author: Faith811
content: CaptchaCoin General /CCG/ CaptchaCoin is the first cryptocurrency powered by proof of human-work, ensuring that mining and purchasing power is distributed to a large number of users and not concentrated in the hands of a few.The main unit of currency is the Cap which has a fixed maximum supply of 1 billion.CaptchaCoin also introduces a secondary unit, Logs, which are mined alongside Caps but cannot be traded and are tied permanently to a wallet. If you're reading this then congratulations, you've discovered CaptchaCoin during Phase 0 of the pre-launch.More information and features will be rolled out over time. Join us on the start of this journey by mining your first Caps now.November 4th 2022 - Price 0.00001USDDecember 20th 2022$0.005242 price per Cap>0.65% pre-launch Caps mined>645,960 Caps mined>399 wallets createdCome join us in making Proof of Human-work (POHW) Wanna make 18 bucks a captcha when this thing goes live? Come join us at Captchacoin.net
